turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yo I need some pizza from Dominos.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which Dominos are you ordering from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one on East Broad near the mall.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Perfect. What will you be needing today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to get two--no three pizzas. Do the 7.99 deal.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It appears that is only for carry out, is that all right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh shoot, I forgot. No, best just do normal large pizzas with delivery then.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. What do you want on your pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: On one I want black olives, mozzarella balls, and spinach.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It looks like they don't have mozzarella as an option. Will feta do?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: ...I suppose.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. Any special instructions for the crust or sauce?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, just normal.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. And for the other two?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Make one Hawaiian-- it's a beautiful pizza no matter what buzzfeed says -- and make that one with extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I whole heartedly agree with you. And for the last?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Make it gluten free with just literally all the veggies and no meat. Sauce and cheese normal.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, so that's all three pizzas. I have one hawaiian, one gluten free with veggies, and one with spinach, feta, and black olives. Anything else for the order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's all and that's correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. That should arrive in about 25 minutes. Have a good night!
